column3:
We’ve added two new gift sets with children in mind – a collection of bakeware for the budding chef and a tea set for younger hostesses. Both come attractively packaged in their own sturdy gift box.
1st Bakers, our bakeware set, includes
a cookie sheet, a muffin tin, 2 cake pans and a loaf pan. Only available in red and pink marble. BAKERM, BAKEPNK
Size: Cake Pans-5"D, Loaf Pan-3"x4.5", Cookie Sheet-8"x10", Muffin Pan-8"x10"
Item BAKE

As durable as it is versatile, enamelware has long been a cook's favorite in the kitchen.  It moves easily from refrigerator to oven and stovetop- even to the barbecue or grill.  The baked-on porcelain finish makes it easy to clean.  In our bright colors and patterns, enamelware goes from the kitchen to the table, often doubling as serving pieces.  Plus, it travels well to potlucks, family gatherings and other outdoor events.
Size: 1qt, 2qt, 2.5qt, 3qt
